title: Curves & Courage
description: Sophie’s father ripped her from the only family she’d known at the tender age of twelve. Nearly five years later, he’s a shell of a man and she’s a ghost of a werewolf, battered and broken.Until she meets her mate.Dominick is everything Sophie needs and wants. He awakens her spirit; he turns her world upside down with his charm.Until he discovers her secret.Dom is ready to fight for his curvy mate, but Sophie isn’t ready to let him.Until her past and present collide in an unforgettable battle.
author: Christin Lovell
